document.full_text: nyse euronext sees cost savings in its $9.8 billion deal with deutsche boerse at closer to 400 million euros ($580 million), up by about a third from its initial estimate, according to a big board spokesman on sunday.
document.title: nyse sees more cost savings in deutsche boerse deal
lines_and_colors: nyse euronext sees cost savings in its $9.8 billion deal with deutsche boerse at closer to 400 million euros ($580 million), up by about a third from its initial estimate, according to a big board spokesman on sunday.
